lines.text: Move tail of B to head of A
Draw vector from tail of A to head of B
Sum is vector from tail of A to head of B

secText:
Lesson:
1. [OBJ:expsec_e787:Add horizontal and vertical vectors].
2. [OBJ:expsec_e789:Add vectors graphically].
3. Add vectors using the [OBJ:expsec_e791:parallelogram method].
4. [OBJ:expsec_e788:Subtract horizontal and vertical vectors].
5. [OBJ:expsec_e790:Subtract vectors graphically].
6. Define [OBJ:expsec_d490:right triangles and use the Pythagorean theorem] to calculate the legs or hypotenuse of a right triangle.
7. [OBJ:expsec_d49067:Calculate the vector magnitude] using the Pythagorean theorem.
8. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_car_change_v_find_accel_question:determine the velocity of a car] given its velocity vector components.
Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_add_vectors_graphically:Combining Vectors Graphically], [OBJ:sum_right_and_pythag:Right Triangles and Pythagorean Theorem]
